T02TD2204E:162b-25: zhib pa 'di ru ma spros so //
T02TD2204E:162b-26: gsang sngags phyag rgya chen po yi //
T02TD2204E:162b-27: rang bzhin mi gnas spros bral yang //
T02TD2204E:162b-28: thabs dang shes rab snang stong dang //
T02TD2204E:162b-29: rigs dang bde la sogs pa yang //
T02TD2204E:162b-30: rigs pas ci yang grub pa min //
T02TD2204E:162b-31: don dam rang bzhin gnas tshul yang //
T02TD2204E:162b-32: rab tu mi gnas rang bzhin te //
T02TD2204E:162b-33: mi gnas pa yi ngo bor 'dod //
T02TD2204E:162b-34: bden gnyis gcig gi ngo bo yang //
T02TD2204E:162b-35: don dam spros bral stong nyid bsgom //
T02TD2204E:162b-36: kun rdzob sgyu mas bsod nams bsag / de ltar rtogs pa'i man ngag kyang //
T02TD2204E:162b-37: bla med bla med las byung gi //
T02TD2204E:162b-38: pha rol dbu ma pa la min //
T02TD2204E:162b-40: de ltar rtogs pa'i gzang zag la //
T02TD2204E:162b-41: lam la bar chod bdud med de //
T02TD2204E:162b-43: lta bas man ngag rtogs pa ste //
T02TD2204E:162b-44: rigs pa bar chos myur du zhi //
T02TD2204E:162b-45: bar chos rang gi sems las byung //
T02TD2204E:162b-46: des na shes rab mig tu gsungs //
T02TD2204E:162b-47: lta ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u steng dgu pa'o /
T02TD2204E:162b-49: // / bdud rtsi lnga la spyod pa dang //
T02TD2204E:162b-50: rig ma ye shes skye tshul gyis //
T02TD2204E:162b-51: gsang bas bzlog par bya ba ni //
T02TD2204E:162b-52: gsang ba'i spyod pas bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2204E:162b-53: cho ga bcu yis bshags pa dang //
T02TD2204E:162b-54: yi dam lha la lus dbul zhing //
T02TD2204E:163a-2: cho gas dbang du sdud pa'o //
T02TD2204E:163a-3: bdag las byung ba'i khro tshogs dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-4: lus las mtshon cha'i char 'bebs dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-5: de dang drag po sbyor sngags dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-6: mi 'da' gsang ba'i sngags zlos pa //
T02TD2204E:163a-7: bdag 'od dbyibs las byung ba yi //
T02TD2204E:163a-8: thog 'bebs sbyor ba rtsom pa dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-9: me dang chu yi 'khor lo dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-10: man ngag stobs kyis bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2204E:163a-11: yungs kar dang ni yungs nag dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-12: skye tshe shang tshe gu gu la dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-13: dgu 'bras bra bcing rdzas kyis bsrung //
T02TD2204E:163a-14: rdzas kyis bzlog pa'i man ngag go //
T02TD2204E:163a-15: mdun gyi snying du sems dpa' bskyed //
T02TD2204E:163a-17: 'di yang man ngag stobs kyis bzlog / gang yang dmigs pa'i mgrin pa ru //
T02TD2204E:163a-18: aa bsams de dang spyi bo ru //
T02TD2204E:163a-19: rtsa las 'khor lo bskor ba yang //
T02TD2204E:163a-20: sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba ste //
T02TD2204E:163a-22: rdo rje rtse gsum phyag rgya dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-23: dam tshig rdo rje sdigs mdzub kyis //
T02TD2204E:163a-24: rga gra ral gri la sogs pa //
T02TD2204E:163a-25: phyag rgya bzlog par gsungs pa yin //
T02TD2204E:163a-26: dngos dang nyams la sogs pa ru //
T02TD2204E:163a-27: bkra shis 'khor lo dga' zhing sogs //
T02TD2204E:163a-28: chags par gyur pa rul myags dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-29: dum bu lang ling rnam par bsam //
T02TD2204E:163a-30: shin tu khro bar 'gyur ba la //
T02TD2204E:163a-31: byams pa bsgom zhing dngos po btsal //
T02TD2204E:163a-32: snying rje la sogs skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:163a-33: gti mgu la sogs chos rnams dbye //
T02TD2204E:163a-34: de bzhin mi dge gnyen po ru //
T02TD2204E:163a-35: dge ba ma lus bsam pa yin //
T02TD2204E:163a-36: gzhan yang log pa'i don bstan na //
T02TD2204E:163a-37: bdag la chos dang chos can rnams //
T02TD2204E:163a-38: rang bzhin med dang sgyu ma dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-39: stong dang zhi ba sems kyi dang //
T02TD2204E:163a-40: tsho 'phrul yin par shes pa yis //
T02TD2204E:163a-41: brda dang phyag rgya la sogs pa //
T02TD2204E:163a-42: don dang sbyar la sbyin par bya //
T02TD2204E:163a-43: thabs kyis ston na shes rab la //
T02TD2204E:163a-44: shes rab thabs la sogs par sbyar //
T02TD2204E:163a-45: glen pa'i lan yang myur du sbyin //
T02TD2204E:163a-46: bdud rnams sbyor ba ma lus pa //
T02TD2204E:163a-47: ting 'dzin gsal zhing brtson 'grus drag / bdud rnams bzlog pa'i mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD2204E:163a-48: bar du gcod pa ma zlogs na //
T02TD2204E:163a-49: dngos grub med cing phyal bar gtong //
T02TD2204E:163b-0: des @163b na bzlog pa shin tu gces //
T02TD2204E:163b-1: bdud bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o /
T02TD2204E:163b-3: // / mdangs dang srog la par chos byed //
T02TD2204E:163b-4: gdug pa ma lus sel ba'i phyir //
T02TD2204E:163b-5: sbyor ba'i 'di yi man ngag bstan //
T02TD2204E:163b-6: gnas ni yid 'od la sogs su //
T02TD2204E:163b-7: bsnyen pa rnam gsum rdzogs pa dang ;
T02TD2204E:163b-9: // zhi ba la sogs so so yi //
T02TD2204E:163b-10: gang ltar 'dod pa'i sku bskyed pa //
T02TD2204E:163b-11: bsdu ba la sogs rdzogs pa yis //
T02TD2204E:163b-12: zhi ba dang ni rgyas la sogs //
T02TD2204E:163b-13: tshogs dang gtor ma sngo zhing bsdu //
T02TD2204E:163b-14: des kyang 'dul bar 'gyur bya ba ni //
T02TD2204E:163b-15: yang na de yi sbyor ba la //
T02TD2204E:163b-16: rkang pa g-yas pa ral gri la ;
T02TD2204E:163b-17: / g-yon pa lcags su kyu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:163b-18: khro bo mi g-yo bsgom bya ste //
T02TD2204E:163b-19: g-yon pas bkug cing g-yas pas gtub //
T02TD2204E:163b-20: ral gris gsang sngags bzlas pa dang //
T02TD2204E:163b-21: gdab pa yang ni de bzhin no //
T02TD2204E:163b-22: yang na gzir pa'i cho ga ni //
T02TD2204E:163b-23: nad pa'am ni gzugs dag la //
T02TD2204E:163b-24: dmigs pas legs par bkug byas nas //
T02TD2204E:163b-25: rkang pa g-yas pa ri rab la //
T02TD2204E:163b-27: rgyal chen phyogs skyong gong dang 'og / bad rim rnams la nges par bsam //
T02TD2204E:163b-28: bus mo chu srin rgyal mtshan te //
T02TD2204E:163b-29: mkha' lding rgyal po rab tu khros //
T02TD2204E:163b-30: gnas snga las dang sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:163b-31: g-yon pa lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:163b-32: bkug pa la sogs pa sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:163b-33: snying gar mnan gyur drag sngags dang //
T02TD2204E:163b-36: mi bzod smre sngags 'don pa dang //
T02TD2204E:163b-38: yang na snying nang ram las me //
T02TD2204E:163b-41: phyogs skyong gang dang 'dul ba yi //
T02TD2204E:163b-42: gong ma'am ni khor bo bcus //
T02TD2204E:163b-43: gzir zhing ral la srung bar byed //
T02TD2204E:163b-45: bar chad byed pa gzhan yang sel ;
T02TD2204E:163b-47: mdangs la rgol ba'i gdug pa yang //
T02TD2204E:163b-48: khyad par klu yi sbyor ba ste //
T02TD2204E:163b-49: rigs bzhi la sogs klu rnams la //
T02TD2204E:163b-50: gzir ba mkha' ding lnga po ste //
T02TD2204E:163b-51: dgongs dang bka' brgyud gzhan rnams dang //
T02TD2204E:164a-1: dus grangs la sogs bskyar ba yang //
T02TD2204E:164a-2: ha pa la sogs ga ru tas //
T02TD2204E:164a-3: shin tu grub par 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2204E:164a-4: lnga la lnga ni legs gnas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-5: lnga po yi ni sbyor bas 'dzin //
T02TD2204E:164a-6: bus mo dpung ba nu 'dzing drug //
T02TD2204E:164a-7: thogs med 'khor lo rab tu bsam //
T02TD2204E:164a-8: byin rlabs nus dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD2204E:164a-9: rdo rje brdeg cing lcags kyus 'dzin //
T02TD2204E:164a-11: gang yang rung bar 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2204E:164a-12: klu gnyen bde gshegs skur gnas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-13: g-yas pa rtse lnga thogs med lnga //
T02TD2204E:164a-16: / g-yon pa rtsa las byung ba ste //
T02TD2204E:164a-17: sum las rin chen rdo steng du //
T02TD2204E:164a-18: khro las byung ba sna lnga bsam //
T02TD2204E:164a-19: 'od zer gyis ni legs bkug ste //
T02TD2204E:164a-20: lus dang ba spu'i mtshams rnams su //
T02TD2204E:164a-21: nus dang ldan par byas pa la //
T02TD2204E:164a-23: lte ba 'khor lo bskor byas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-24: g-yas kyi rdo rjes par byas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-25: g-yon pas lan par byed cing 'don //
T02TD2204E:164a-26: g-yon sbyor la sogs man ngag kyang //
T02TD2204E:164a-27: mdangs rgol nad la shin tu bsngags //
T02TD2204E:164a-28: yan na me gnyis steg par byed //
T02TD2204E:164a-30: gnas brgyad du ni bsam byas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-31: bsregs pa rlung gis gtor byas te //
T02TD2204E:164a-32: bkrus pa byang chub thig le las //
T02TD2204E:164a-33: dpal ldan skur gyur byin gyis brlab //
T02TD2204E:164a-34: dbang thob sku yi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2204E:164a-35: yang na zangs sogs dmar pa'i snod //
T02TD2204E:164a-36: gzugs byas yongs su bskor ba las //
T02TD2204E:164a-37: bdud rtsi gso zhing mchod pa las //
T02TD2204E:164a-38: de nas rang gi gnas su bskyal //
T02TD2204E:164a-39: des kyang dul bar 'gyur ba yin //
T02TD2204E:164a-40: khyad par can gyis bdag dang gzhan //
T02TD2204E:164a-41: gdul thabs gnyis phyir bsal thabs gnyis //
T02TD2204E:164a-42: myur du gnod sel nus pa yin //
T02TD2204E:164a-43: de bas 'di ni thabs kyi mchog /
T02TD2204E:164a-44: sbyor ba gzhan la yod pa min //
T02TD2204E:164a-45: bar chod kyi bgegs bzlog pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o /
T02TD2204E:164a-47: // / mi rgod la sogs ma rungs pas //
T02TD2204E:164a-48: gtses shing chos la gnod byed pa //
T02TD2204E:164a-49: gnad la bor ba'i dam tshig ni //
T02TD2204E:164b-0: drag po gru gsum @164b dug gis bri //
T02TD2204E:164b-1: rkang rjes gos sogs pag zan dang //
T02TD2204E:164b-2: bsreg te mi rgod gzugs byas la //
T02TD2204E:164b-3: de yi snying gar ming rus gzhug / tsha ba bskyed pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2204E:164b-4: de la tshon skud rnam lngas bcing //
T02TD2204E:164b-5: rabs chad thod par gzhug pa yin //
T02TD2204E:164b-6: rang bskyed rang gi chog rdzogs //
T02TD2204E:164b-7: bde gshegs mchod dang chos skyong sbyin //
T02TD2204E:164b-8: de yang rna las gzugs su gyur //
T02TD2204E:164b-9: bdag las sprul pa'i khro tshogs kyis //
T02TD2204E:164b-10: dpag tu med pas 'jig rten bkang //
T02TD2204E:164b-11: gzung nas khrid par byed pa la //
T02TD2204E:164b-12: rdo rje 'gugs pa'i gsad sngags bzlas //
T02TD2204E:164b-13: khro bo mang po sbrul pa khros //
T02TD2204E:164b-14: gang gis dngos po gzung ba yis //
T02TD2204E:164b-15: gnyis med bstim la las kyis mnan //
T02TD2204E:164b-16: thogs lnga la sogs myos su gzhug / ye shes 'go ba'i lha rnams kyis //
T02TD2204E:164b-17: gshegs shing srog rtsa bram ze'i gzugs //
T02TD2204E:164b-18: gdug pa'i khro mo byar mas bdug / khros pa'i stabs kyis khrag 'byin cing //
T02TD2204E:164b-19: rang gis rol za bar byed //
T02TD2204E:164b-20: bdag dang ye shes khro bo yis //
T02TD2204E:164b-21: sbrul pa thogs lngas 'byed par byed //
T02TD2204E:164b-22: phyi ma gsum gyis gsad pa dang //
T02TD2204E:164b-23: theg chen sbyor ba'i las bya yi //
T02TD2204E:164b-24: dkyil 'khor kun gyi gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD2204E:164b-25: gsad cing mnan pa'i las rnams bya //
T02TD2204E:164b-26: yang na gsang ba'i dam pa ni //
T02TD2204E:164b-27: lcags dang rigs mthun gyur pa la //
T02TD2204E:164b-28: khro bo de dang mthun byas la //
T02TD2204E:164b-30: phur bu kho nas gsad pa yi //
T02TD2204E:164b-31: ki li'i sngags brjod gdab par bya //
T02TD2204E:164b-32: ral gri thob gri rnams kyis //
T02TD2204E:164b-33: gtub cing gsad dang rdzas rnams ni //
T02TD2204E:164b-34: yungs kar yungs nag phye ma gsum //
T02TD2204E:164b-35: bdug pa'i 'grub rnams ma lus las //
T02TD2204E:164b-36: khro chung gdug pas khra ba nas 'brub //
T02TD2204E:164b-37: drag sngags bzlas shing thun rnams brdeg / bsnun cing gtub pa'i rdzas dang gzugs //
T02TD2204E:164b-38: mnan sreg gsad dang 'phang ba dang //
T02TD2204E:164b-39: yang dang yang du dgug pa dang //
T02TD2204E:164b-40: thugs rjes bag chags sbyang ba'o //
T02TD2204E:164b-41: gzugs can gdul ba'i las rnams bstan //
T02TD2204E:164b-42: mdze can rabs chad thod pa ru //
T02TD2204E:164b-43: 'khor lo gzhung dang mthun pa la //
T02TD2204E:164b-44: dug dang myos pa'i chu sbyar te //
T02TD2204E:165a-0: sbrul nag sbyor ba mdze can khrag gis @165a * //
T02TD2204E:165a-2: / de la dgug pa sngon 'gro pas //
T02TD2204E:165a-3: lus nang nang nas lcags sbrang mang //
T02TD2204E:165a-4: lus nang sbrul nag sbyor nas ni //
T02TD2204E:165a-5: lcags dig srin bu la sogs pas //
T02TD2204E:165a-6: ba spu'i bu gar sbyor bas na //
T02TD2204E:165a-7: de ni mdze yis 'chi ba yin //
T02TD2204E:165a-8: de bzhin 'khor lo nag po'i sten //
T02TD2204E:165a-9: gang yin sgos su gsal byas nas //
T02TD2204E:165a-10: bsam gyi mi khyab phung las bu //
T02TD2204E:165a-11: stong gsum sprul na dgug cing bstim //
T02TD2204E:165a-12: sgrub las lcags sprang gzi ma yis //
T02TD2204E:165a-13: ba spu'i bu gnas zhugs pas //
T02TD2204E:165a-14: me yis bsregs pa 'byung ba yi //
T02TD2204E:165a-15: 'di yang thabs kyi dam pa yin //
T02TD2204E:165a-16: byang du bltas pa'i chu mig tu //
T02TD2204E:165a-17: thod dum bu drug yod par //
T02TD2204E:165a-18: gang yin ming rus spags te gzhug //
T02TD2204E:165a-19: sbrul nags srin la sogs bstim //
T02TD2204E:165a-20: yang yang bkug la mnan pa yis //
T02TD2204E:165a-23: yang nam mo'i sbyor ba yang //
T02TD2204E:165a-24: bud med thod pa lcang lo nang //
T02TD2204E:165a-25: dri rgod snying la rab bsams te //
T02TD2204E:165a-26: bdud rtsi lnga byas lang+ge la //
T02TD2204E:165a-27: lnga pa las sogs phral byas na //
T02TD2204E:165a-28: snying nang ma mo'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:165a-29: khar blugs gyur na myos nas 'chi //
T02TD2204E:165a-30: thod pa glang pa 'khor lo bskor //
T02TD2204E:165a-31: dug dang myos pa dug khrag dang //
T02TD2204E:165a-32: lug dang glang gi khrag dag gis //
T02TD2204E:165a-33: smyo byed sbyor bar byas shing //
T02TD2204E:165a-34: mkhar ba'i thun yang rab tu brdeg / ma ma ra ksha kha thun tra ma hi hrim hi ru lu ru lu bhyo /
T02TD2204E:165a-35: zhes bod cing rbad par bya'o //
T02TD2204E:165a-36: dgug pa sngon du song ba la //
T02TD2204E:165a-37: mdun du ma mo khrag 'jib pas //
T02TD2204E:165a-38: phur bus spyi bor gdab byas nas //
T02TD2204E:165a-40: de ltar byas pas skya sla ma 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:165a-41: yang na spyi tshags byug pa la //
T02TD2204E:165a-42: mdun du skyi tshags rdo rje brdeg / yang ni kha dog nag po la //
T02TD2204E:165a-43: mgo po me yi phreng ba bskul //
T02TD2204E:165a-44: sum skor 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02TD2204E:165a-45: rdo rje spyi bor zhugs gyur nas //
T02TD2204E:165a-46: 'od zer snying nar sreg par byed //
T02TD2204E:165a-47: thig le dag kyang 'dzoms la yin //
T02TD2204E:165a-48: yang na 'od zer nag po yang //
T02TD2204E:165a-49: lte bar 'khor lo bskul byas te //
T02TD2204E:165a-50: me 'bar stobs kyis sreg pa dang //
T02TD2204E:165a-51: spyi bor khu ba bkug nas ni //
T02TD2204E:165a-52: rkang pa me nang sreg par byed //
T02TD2204E:165b-0: yang na za byed la @165b ru sreg / yang na rdo rje yi ge gsal //
T02TD2204E:165b-1: spyi nas gsang ba rdo rje rgyab //
T02TD2204E:165b-2: bshad pa'i yi ge ba zhig pa yin //
T02TD2204E:165b-3: yang na snying gar ram las me //
T02TD2204E:165b-4: se nang me yis sreg pa dang //
T02TD2204E:165b-5: dbang phyug la sogs bdud chen rnams //
T02TD2204E:165b-7: sbyor ba 'di ni byas tsam gyis //
T02TD2204E:165b-8: gang ltar 'dod pa myur du grub //
T02TD2204E:165b-9: yang na dbang phyug mthu chen gyi //
T02TD2204E:165b-10: rig pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:165b-11: nag po tshes gcig zla ba la //
T02TD2204E:165b-12: dmigs pa chu yi 'od zer la //
T02TD2204E:165b-13: sbyor ba 'di ni byas tsam gyis //
T02TD2204E:165b-14: dgu dang mi yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:165b-16: gang yang myur du 'grub pa yin //
T02TD2204E:165b-17: sbyor ba 'di yi man ngag kyang //
T02TD2204E:165b-18: bla ma'i srog la gnod pa dang //
T02TD2204E:165b-19: dkon mchog bstan pa bsnub pa dang //
T02TD2204E:165b-20: rang srog gcod par byed pa la //
T02TD2204E:165b-21: sbyor ba 'di ni bya ba las //
T02TD2204E:165b-22: gzhan la byas na dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2204E:165b-23: bar chod bsal ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o /
T02TD2204E:165b-26: // / dngos grub khyad par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD2204E:165b-27: su gsungs thugs kyi rtags rnams la //
T02TD2204E:165b-28: rab gnas byas pa thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:165b-29: des na rab gnas cho gal //
T02TD2204E:165b-30: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu //
T02TD2204E:165b-31: dang po bsnyen pa skyel ba yis ;
T02TD2204E:165b-33: yo byad sogs la bskyal ba yin //
T02TD2204E:165b-34: lha dang bum la sogs pa //
T02TD2204E:165b-35: sta gon lhag par gnas par byas //
T02TD2204E:165b-36: sku gsungs thugs kyi rtag rnams la //
T02TD2204E:165b-37: dang la bgegs bsal byung phud la //
T02TD2204E:165b-38: phur bu sbyin sreg chang phud gtor ;
T02TD2204E:165b-39: / me la phul zhing bskor byas nas //
T02TD2204E:165b-40: thal ba'i sbyin sreg phyi ru bskyal //
T02TD2204E:165b-41: dbang stegs dag la khrul rnams byas //
T02TD2204E:165b-42: dang po dra chu dang sbyar ba'i //
T02TD2204E:165b-43: mngar gsum aa ka ru la sogs //
T02TD2204E:165b-44: me long sbyin nam d'ur bas bkru //
T02TD2204E:165b-45: lhag gnas slob ma cho ga rdzogs //
T02TD2204E:165b-46: dkyil 'khor bris la yongs su bsgrub //
T02TD2204E:165b-47: dang po dbang bskur rab gnas la //
T02TD2204E:165b-48: slob ma bcug ste dbang bskur bya //
T02TD2204E:165b-49: sku gsung thugs kya rtag rnams la //
T02TD2204E:165b-50: rang rang sku gsum lhar bskyed de //
T02TD2204E:165b-51: byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ni //
T02TD2204E:165b-52: me long bzhin du chu dbang bskur//
T02TD2204E:166a-0: @166a * // des na de la dbang rnams rdzogs //
T02TD2204E:166a-1: rang gi sngags sam gzhan rnams ni //
T02TD2204E:166a-3: gang gi stobs kyis gong du gnas //
T02TD2204E:166a-4: yang na sbu rnams so so la //
T02TD2204E:166a-5: rang gi bdag po gtso 'am gang bskyed la //
T02TD2204E:166a-6: dbang bskur la sogs gong bzhin bya //
T02TD2204E:166a-7: lha khang sgom pa'i rten yin pas //
T02TD2204E:166a-8: ye shes byin brlab gong bzhin bya //
T02TD2204E:166a-9: rdo rje dril bu phreng ba rnams //
T02TD2204E:166a-10: ye shes rdo rje dri phreng rnams //
T02TD2204E:166a-11: a'a li k'a li ye shes dang //
T02TD2204E:166a-12: byin gyis brlab pa tsam yang bya //
T02TD2204E:166a-13: de nas mchod bstod la sogs pa //
T02TD2204E:166a-14: rgyas par byas la dkyil 'khor bsdu //
T02TD2204E:166a-15: rdul tshon chu bo'i gzhung la dbo //
T02TD2204E:166a-16: de ltar slob dpon de la yang //
T02TD2204E:166a-17: ci 'byor ba yin yon rnams dbul //
T02TD2204E:166a-18: dga' ston bya zhing smon lam gdab //
T02TD2204E:166a-19: des ni bsod nams chen po thob //
T02TD2204E:166a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi rtags rnams la //
T02TD2204E:166a-21: rab tu gnas pa ma byas na //
T02TD2204E:166a-22: mu stegs lha rten dang 'dra bas //
T02TD2204E:166a-23: des na rab gnas bya ba gces //
T02TD2204E:166a-24: rab tu gnas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o /
T02TD2204E:166a-26: // / de la de yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:166a-27: phyi dang nang gi khrus bstan pa //
T02TD2204E:166a-28: rdzas rnams tshogs pa'i bum pa la //
T02TD2204E:166a-29: lhag pas bum pa sbyang byas te //
T02TD2204E:166a-30: padma bzhi ste gos sngon bskyed //
T02TD2204E:166a-31: bskyed de cho ga rdzogs gyur nas//
T02TD2204E:166a-32: dag par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyis //
T02TD2204E:166a-33: ye shes chu bor byin brlabs te //
T02TD2204E:166a-34: nam mkha'i lha mos snod thogs nas //
T02TD2204E:166a-35: lha mos rgyun phab chu bo yis //
T02TD2204E:166a-36: gang la bkrus pa tsam gyis na //
T02TD2204E:166a-37: 'thor bas dag par byed pa dang //
T02TD2204E:166a-38: dngos grub thams cad 'byung ba yin //
T02TD2204E:166a-40: des na khrus la brtson par bya'o //
T02TD2204E:166a-41: rdo rje khrus kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o /
T02TD2204E:166a-43: // / de las dngos grub mchog 'dod pa //
T02TD2204E:166a-44: rnam grangs don ni rab brten la //
T02TD2204E:166a-45: thabs kyi lam ni rab tu bstan //
T02TD2204E:166a-46: dang por mtshan bcas mtshan med la //
T02TD2204E:166a-47: nor bu 'phel par byed pa yin //
T02TD2204E:166a-48: rten gyi man ngag cung zhig yang //
T02TD2204E:166a-49: gang zhig spyi bo khang pa ru //
T02TD2204E:166a-50: bdun cu gnyis sam drug cu bzhi //
T02TD2204E:166a-51: sum cu gnyis dang brgyad dang bzhi //
T02TD2204E:166a-53: kun brtags rtog pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02TD2204E:166a-54: a'a li gnyis dang k'a li gcig /
T02TD2204E:166b-0: @166b brgya dang 'byung bzhi yang dag ldan //
T02TD2204E:166b-1: de ltas de las ye shes 'bar //
T02TD2204E:166b-2: steng dang 'og tu rgyu tshul ni //
T02TD2204E:166b-3: dbang po 'gag par byed pa yin //
T02TD2204E:166b-4: yang na tshangs nas smin mtshams bar //
T02TD2204E:166b-5: rtsa lnga kha phye spyod pa yis //
T02TD2204E:166b-6: skye mched yul rnams sbyong ba'o //
T02TD2204E:166b-7: snang ba mtha' yas gnas dag tu //
T02TD2204E:166b-8: bzhi bcu'am ni sum cu gnyis //
T02TD2204E:166b-9: bcu drug brgyad du snang ba la //
T02TD2204E:166b-10: 'byung bzhi a'a li bcu drug ni //
T02TD2204E:166b-11: g-yas dang g-yon du 'khor bar gnas //
T02TD2204E:166b-12: dbus kyi aom ni dpa' bo'i bdag //
T02TD2204E:166b-13: dbang gi dga' bzhi skyed pa dang //
T02TD2204E:166b-14: yang na bde chen kha 'byed cing //
T02TD2204E:166b-17: snying gar brgyad dang bcu drug bzhi //
T02TD2204E:166b-18: dbus su dh'u t'i g-yas g-yon du //
T02TD2204E:166b-19: la la n'a dang ras n'a'o //
T02TD2204E:166b-20: a'a li k'a li thabs shes rab //
T02TD2204E:166b-21: byang chub thig les nyon mongs shing //
T02TD2204E:166b-22: 'byung ba bzhi dang yi ge yi //
T02TD2204E:166b-23: dang po brgyad pos yongs bskor ba //
T02TD2204E:166b-24: thig le las byung 'byung ba bskul //
T02TD2204E:166b-25: thig le ye shes la brten nas //
T02TD2204E:166b-26: dbang gi dga' bzhi'i tshul du bskyed //
T02TD2204E:166b-28: gnas pa stong pa bdag nyid de //
T02TD2204E:166b-29: gang zhig 'di la rtog gnas na //
T02TD2204E:166b-30: rnal 'byor bde ba myong bar byed //
T02TD2204E:166b-31: yang na snying ga nas spro ba'i //
T02TD2204E:166b-32: rtsa lnga khrag dang chu dang yang //
T02TD2204E:166b-33: byang chub sems kyi thig le las //
T02TD2204E:166b-34: mdung dang ral gri nges pa la //
T02TD2204E:166b-36: phyogs su gzhol zhing slob pa yin //
T02TD2204E:166b-39: rnal 'byor bde ba myong bar byed //
T02TD2204E:166b-40: re re'am ni lnga lnga bar //
T02TD2204E:166b-41: rnal 'byor slob ma bde ba'i lam //
T02TD2204E:166b-42: lte ba sprul pa dpa' bo bdag //
T02TD2204E:166b-43: brgyad dang nyi shu sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:166b-44: k'a li phyed bcas su bzhi brgyad //
T02TD2204E:166b-45: aa nas dga' bo rlung stobs kyis //
T02TD2204E:166b-46: rtsa lnga snying gar slob pa dang //
T02TD2204E:166b-47: dpa' bo 'gegs par byed pa yin //
T02TD2204E:166b-48: kha cig slob pa'i dus dag tu //
T02TD2204E:166b-49: bzhi ni so sor slob pa ste //
T02TD2204E:166b-50: bzhi ni gcig tu slob pa'o //
T02TD2204E:166b-51: nyi ma rdo rje rlung gis gsor //
T02TD2204E:166b-52: la la yi ge thig ler 'dod //
T02TD2204E:166b-53: gcig ni sdud par bslabs pa yis //
T02TD2204E:166b-54: stong pa me las rnam rtog sred //
T02TD2204E:166b-55: dbang gi dag pa dam pa'o //
T02TD2204E:167a-1: pa chen bo thob par byed //
T02TD2204E:167a-2: gang yang sbyong pa 'di dag ni //
T02TD2204E:167a-3: nyi ma me ni lte bar 'bar //
T02TD2204E:167a-4: yi ge thig les yang dag gsos //
T02TD2204E:167a-5: dbang gi dga' bzhi dag pa yis //
T02TD2204E:167a-6: dbyings la thug nas mar la byung //
T02TD2204E:167a-8: dbab dang bzlog dang 'grub ba yang //
T02TD2204E:167a-9: 'khor lo bzhi yid dbang du gsungs //
T02TD2204E:167a-10: rigs gzhan chags pa'i gang zag gis //
T02TD2204E:167a-11: rigs gzhan pho nya'i sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2204E:167a-12: gang tsha rang gi rigs mthun nam //
T02TD2204E:167a-13: la las skyes pa'i bu mo dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-14: ye shes bu mo sgrub pa dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-15: g-yon gyi yum dang snying ga la //
T02TD2204E:167a-16: byin gyis brlabs dang gnyis med sbyor //
T02TD2204E:167a-17: rtag tu dam pa bde ba dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-18: 'di yi sbyor par dga' pa rnams //
T02TD2204E:167a-19: rim gyis phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'grub //
T02TD2204E:167a-20: 'byung ba'i bu mos sbyor byas shing //
T02TD2204E:167a-21: dbab dang bzlog pa'i man ngag gis //
T02TD2204E:167a-22: rtse la phyin nas nub byang 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:167a-23: tha ma las kyis dus rnams su //
T02TD2204E:167a-24: rked pa tha kus bkyig pa dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-25: dbus dang lus kyi bzlog pa yin //
T02TD2204E:167a-26: thabs ni kun nas rdzogs pa ru //
T02TD2204E:167a-27: ri lu phreng bas mgul nas thogs //
T02TD2204E:167a-28: sprul gyi zhags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2204E:167a-30: gang nas rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis ;
T02TD2204E:167a-31: / rtag tu bde ba ster bar byed //
T02TD2204E:167a-32: ye shes bogs dang dbang bskur gnyis //
T02TD2204E:167a-33: gzhan gyi las su ma gsungs te //
T02TD2204E:167a-34: de nas de spangs dngos grub 'byung //
T02TD2204E:167a-36: sna tshogs thabs kyi sgom pa yis //
T02TD2204E:167a-38: zhing khams gang dang gang yang rung //
T02TD2204E:167a-39: sprul pa byin brlabs phyogs bcur 'gyed //
T02TD2204E:167a-41: zhing khams gtsang mar skye bar 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:167a-42: man ngag ngan song 'khor ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2204E:167a-43: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i rdzogs rim gyi le'u bstan pa ste bco ldan pa'o /
T02TD2204E:167a-45: // / yang na 'khor lo sbyor spangs pas //
T02TD2204E:167a-46: bcu drug brgyad dang bzhin yi dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-47: dbus su byang chub theg le bsgos //
T02TD2204E:167a-48: stong nyid yongs chod bral ba la //
T02TD2204E:167a-49: sgom med goms par bya ba'i yul //
T02TD2204E:167a-50: gnas dang mi g-yo bde ba dang //
T02TD2204E:167a-51: rtog bral rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
T02TD2204E:167b-0: tha snyad ma grub bde chen dang @167b thig le nyams len shes pa yis //
T02TD2204E:167b-1: srid rtse sna gsum mthar phyin nas //
T02TD2204E:167b-2: mthong lam byang chub myur du 'byung //
T02TD2204E:167b-3: de las srid gsum bgrod pa yang //
T02TD2204E:167b-4: skya ba rmi'am bar do ru //
T02TD2204E:167b-5: thig le mi rtog stong nyid yang //
T02TD2204E:167b-6: thig le ye shes de dang las //
T02TD2204E:167b-7: rnal 'byor bde ba chen po yang //
T02TD2204E:167b-8: ma lus cig shos mtha' dang bral //
T02TD2204E:167b-9: srid gsum rang bzhin 'phro ba yang //
T02TD2204E:167b-13: mtshan med kyi man ngag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o /
T02TD2204E:167b-15: // / gang zhig 'di la rab bcom pas ;
T02TD2204E:167b-16: / zla ba drug gam bcu gnyis na //
T02TD2204E:167b-17: rnal 'byor pas ni rab tu thob //
T02TD2204E:167b-18: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi //
T02TD2204E:167b-19: sprul pa'i byin rlabs sna tshogs pas //
T02TD2204E:167b-21: pho nya tshogs 'khor thams cad kyis //
T02TD2204E:167b-22: rtag tu byin brlabs bde ba ster //
T02TD2204E:167b-23: bdud dang gnod sbyin lha klu'i tshogs //
T02TD2204E:167b-24: ma lus gnod pa bzhi bar 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:167b-25: sdu bsngal nad las sogs pa rnams //
T02TD2204E:167b-26: ma lus myur du thar bar 'gyur //
T02TD2204E:167b-27: thun mong dngos grub ma lus 'grub //
T02TD2204E:167b-28: gzhan don ma lus lhun gyi grub //
T02TD2204E:167b-30: gang yang gsang ba'i man ngag 'di ;
T02TD2204E:167b-31: / dam tshig sngom pa nyams pa dang //
T02TD2204E:167b-32: gsang sngags phrag khyer 'tshong ba dang //
T02TD2204E:167b-33: bla ma mi gus le lo can //
T02TD2204E:167b-34: dbyar gyi tsandan lta bu ste //
T02TD2204E:167b-35: mkhas pa brten pa mi brten par //
T02TD2204E:167b-36: glegs bam mthong bas khengs pa la //
T02TD2204E:167b-38: gsang ba'i don dang phyi lam bsre //
T02TD2204E:167b-39: la la log pa'i chos dang bsre //
T02TD2204E:167b-40: gang zhig ster bar 'gyur ba ste //
T02TD2204E:167b-41: tsha grang nga song sdug bsngal myong //
T02TD2204E:167b-42: mkha' 'gro byad ma srin po dang //
T02TD2204E:167b-43: ro langs sogs kun gyis gsod //
T02TD2204E:167b-44: gsad pa 'di yi don rnams dang //
T02TD2204E:167b-45: rang srog gces dang nor bu dang //
T02TD2204E:167b-46: dri ma chog ga phur bzhin du btsa' //
T02TD2204E:167b-47: gal te btsa' ba ma shes na //
T02TD2204E:167b-49: blugs pa ji bzhin 'bras bu med //
T02TD2204E:167b-51: gang gi don las log pa'i snod dang ldan ba la //
T02TD2204E:167b-52: gsang ba 'di yi man ngag yang //
T02TD2204E:168a-0: rang gi rang don len pa @168a * //
T02TD2204E:168a-2: / de la ma lus sbyin par bya //
T02TD2204E:168a-3: nor la bltas te gsang don bcad //
T02TD2204E:168a-4: gsang ba srid pa'i rgyu la byin //
T02TD2204E:168a-5: ma mos btsongs pas dngos grub yul //
T02TD2204E:168a-7: srid tsho ngan song gsum du 'khor //
T02TD2204E:168a-8: 'bras bu tsha grang sdug bsngal myong //
T02TD2204E:168a-9: des na bu dang 'dra bar sbyin //
T02TD2204E:168a-11: gzhan gyi shugs 'byung ma lags 'di la dga' ba skyes //
T02TD2204E:168a-12: khams gsum sems can srid mtsho dag la las rgal phyir dang //
T02TD2204E:168a-13: rdo rje be con gsang ba'i don la sogs pa ma lus pa //
T02TD2204E:168a-14: rang nyid mos dang gsang thabs rnams //
T02TD2204E:168a-15: rdzogs par kun la bstan phyir bris //
T02TD2204E:168a-16: rnyed pa la sogs grags phyir min //
T02TD2204E:168a-17: man ngag bla ma dang 'dra lam 'di bstan //
T02TD2204E:168a-18: lag na rdo rje'i rgyud la sogs pa ma nyams bya ba'i phyir //
T02TD2204E:168a-19: gsang ba'i don rnams thabs kyi yan lag tu //
T02TD2204E:168a-20: man ngag rgyas par bstan pa'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02TD2204E:168a-21: las kyi bag chags ngan pas ma grol yod srid cing //
T02TD2204E:168a-22: tshig dang don la nyes pa yod srid pas //
T02TD2204E:168a-23: rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa dang //
T02TD2204E:168a-24: bla ma / mkhas pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02TD2204E:168a-25: sems can lam gnyis ma lus bsgral ba dang ;
T02TD2204E:168a-26: / bdag dang sems can thams cad kun //
T02TD2204E:168a-27: rags dang phra ba'i rtog pa yongs zhi nas //
T02TD2204E:168a-28: sngom gsum lam gyis srid pa yongs rgal nas //
T02TD2204E:168a-29: tshul khrims gtsang mas gsang ba'i don rnams zhugs //
T02TD2204E:168a-30: phyag rgya chen po don nyid rab mthong zhing //
T02TD2204E:168a-31: de ma mthong ba'i ma lus sems can rnams //
T02TD2204E:168a-32: sdug bsngal skyed pa'i kun 'byung rtsad gcod cing //
T02TD2204E:168a-33: g-yon pa mdze 'bras nad rnams rab tu zhi ba dang //
T02TD2204E:168a-34: sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rab tu skams pa dang //
T02TD2204E:168a-35: gos sngon dngos grub myur thob cing //
T02TD2204E:168a-36: zhing mchog gtsang mar skye bar shog / de kho na nyid sgron na zhes bya ba'i rgyan //
T02TD2204E:168a-37: bla ma'i man rgyud mchad pa //
T02TD2204E:168a-38: de kho na nyid nyi snang ba zhes bya ba'i sgrub thabs chen po dge slong klu sgrub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2204E:168a-40: // / pandi ta gu ru padma 'byung gnas dang /
T02TD2204E:168a-41: lo ts'a ba glang dpal gyis seng+ges bsgyur ro //
T02TD2204E:168b-0: slad kyis kyang pandi tas rgya gar @168b phyogs nas sgra rang 'gyur du bsgyur ro //
T02TD2204E:168b-1: bi la badzra las bla ma sman btsun khros pa la gnang //
